capabilities.name: listProjects
capabilities.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all projects.

capabilities.name: getProjectById
capabilities.description: Retrieves a single project by its unique identifier.

capabilities.name: updateProject
capabilities.description: Updates an existing project by its unique identifier.

capabilities.name: deleteProject
capabilities.description: Deletes a project by its unique identifier. This action is irreversible.

capabilities.name: listTasksForProject
capabilities.description: Retrieves a paginated list of tasks for a specific project.

capabilities.name: createTask
capabilities.description: Creates a new task within a specified project.

capabilities.name: getTaskById
capabilities.description: Retrieves a single task by its unique identifier within a project.

capabilities.name: updateTask
capabilities.description: Updates an existing task by its unique identifier.

capabilities.name: deleteTask
capabilities.description: Deletes a task by its unique identifier. This action is irreversible.
